hero.headline: Burooj: Design. Manage. Clean. Elevated.
hero.subheadline: Integrated construction, property management, and drone-powered cleaning built for today's modern developments.

about.title: About Burooj
about.description: Burooj is a multi-disciplinary Saudi company offering comprehensive solutions across engineering, construction, property management, and drone cleaning. With a commitment to quality, speed, and technology-driven efficiency, we support buildings and properties throughout their entire lifecycle—from design and development to operation and maintenance.

hero.headline: Shaping Smarter Buildings and Stronger Communities.
hero.subheadline: Burooj delivers integrated engineering, property management, and drone-powered cleaning solutions—combining innovation, precision, and decades of multidisciplinary expertise to elevate every project we touch.

section.title: Who We Are
section.description: Burooj is a multi-disciplinary Saudi company offering comprehensive solutions across engineering, construction, property management, and drone cleaning. With a commitment to quality, speed, and technology-driven efficiency, we support buildings and properties throughout their entire lifecycle—from design and development to operation and maintenance.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become the region's most trusted provider of integrated property, engineering, and cleaning solutions through innovation, quality, and reliability.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To deliver modern, high-quality, and technology-driven services that support clients throughout the entire lifecycle of their properties.

stat1.description: Projects delivered, covering residential villas, commercial fit-outs, smart systems, and high-rise drone cleaning.

stat2.description: Managed units & assets — providing structured, data-driven property management with reporting automation.

stat3.description: Square meters cleaned by drones — fast, safe, and eco-efficient façade and solar panel cleaning across the Kingdom.

stat4.description: Years of excellence — delivering integrated solutions across engineering, property management, and innovation.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: The principles that guide everything we do

founder.name: Mohammed Bin Faihan
founder.title: CEO & Founder
founder.intro: At Burooj, we design beyond convention. Every detail, every project, every moment — crafted to redefine what integrated property solutions can be.
founder.messagePart1: At Burooj, we build more than properties — we craft experiences with purpose. Standing at the intersection of engineering, management, and innovation, we create solutions that move developments forward and leave a lasting impact.
founder.messagePart2: We don't chase trends — we challenge them. Guided by excellence, we operate at the edge of innovation — blending precision, technology, and reliability to craft services that resonate deeper than expectations. We're not here to follow the market. We're here to define what's next.
founder.messagePart3: That's why we've powered projects, shaped communities, and built platforms for developments that refuse to stay ordinary — from residential villas to commercial towers. Whatever the scale, the goal is the same: create work that endures.

bts.title: Behind The Scenes
bts.subtitle: How We Work
bts.description: From initial concept to final delivery, see how our team brings projects to life with precision, innovation, and dedication.

clients.title: Our trusted partners, from bold startups to global icons

process.title: Our Process
process.subtitle: A structured approach to delivering exceptional results

drone.title: Drone Cleaning Services
drone.description: Burooj Air is the first drone-cleaning provider in Saudi Arabia and the GCC, offering fast, safe, and eco-friendly cleaning for high-rise buildings, solar panels, industrial structures, and high-access assets.

highlight.title: Reinventing Cleaning Through Drone Technology
highlight.description: Burooj Air introduces a safer, faster, and more efficient approach to cleaning across the Kingdom—removing the need for scaffolding, reducing risks, and delivering consistent results.

page.title: Services
page.headline: Integrated services from design to operations
page.description: Burooj unifies construction, property management, and drone cleaning through a single team, ensuring consistent standards and faster delivery.

clients.title: Trusted by Leading Developers and Corporates
clients.description: Trusted by leading companies, developers, investors, and organizations across Saudi Arabia.

footer.description: Integrated construction, property management, and drone cleaning solutions powered by technology and Saudi expertise.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Burooj ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website at burooj.pro. By using our website, you consent to the data practices described in this policy.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: We may collect information that you provide directly to us, including but not limited to:
items: Personal identification information such as your full name, title, company name, email address, phone number, and physical address
Contact information including mailing address, business address, and preferred method of communication
Information you provide when filling out forms on our website, including contact forms, service inquiry forms, and consultation request forms
Information you provide when contacting us for services or inquiries, including project details, service requirements, budget information, and timeline expectations

Files and documents you upload through our contact forms, including but not limited to project briefs, RFPs (Request for Proposals), architectural drawings, specifications, photographs, and other relevant documentation
Payment and billing information if you engage our services, including credit card details, bank account information, and billing addresses
Communication records including emails, phone call logs, meeting notes, and correspondence related to your inquiries or projects
Any other information you choose to provide voluntarily, such as feedback, testimonials, or additional context about your needs

automaticallyCollected.title: Automatically Collected Information
automaticallyCollected.content: When you visit our website, we may automatically collect certain information about your device and browsing behavior, including but not limited to:
items: IP address, browser type and version, and device identifiers
Pages you visit, time spent on each page, click patterns, and navigation paths through our website
Referring website addresses (URLs) that directed you to our site
Date and time of your visit, session duration, and frequency of visits
Device information including device type, operating system, screen resolution, and language settings
Cookies and similar tracking technologies data, including session cookies and persistent cookies
Geographic location data (general location based on IP address)
Website performance metrics and error logs

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including but not limited to:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services including engineering, construction, property management, and drone cleaning services, ensuring quality delivery and client satisfaction
Respond to your inquiries, requests, and provide customer support, including answering questions, addressing concerns, and facilitating communication
Process and manage service requests and project proposals, including evaluating feasibility, preparing quotes, and coordinating project execution
Send you updates, newsletters, marketing communications, and service announcements about our services, new offerings, and company news (you may opt-out at any time)
Comply with legal obligations, regulatory requirements, and enforce our terms of service, including responding to legal requests and protecting against fraud
Protect our rights, property, and safety, as well as that of our clients, employees, partners, and the general public
Analyze website usage patterns, user behavior, and improve user experience, website functionality, and service delivery
Conduct business operations including accounting, billing, contract management, and internal record keeping
Facilitate business transactions, process payments, and manage financial records
Conduct research and analytics to understand market trends, improve our services, and develop new offerings

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
items: With service providers and business partners who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business, including but not limited to hosting providers, email service providers, payment processors, analytics services, customer relationship management (CRM) systems, and marketing platforms, all of whom are contractually obligated to protect your information
With subcontractors, vendors, and professional service providers (such as architects, engineers, contractors) who are involved in delivering services to you, subject to confidentiality agreements
When required by law, court order, or governmental regulation, or to respond to legal process, subpoenas, or government requests
To protect our rights, property, and safety, as well as that of our users, employees, clients, and partners, including fraud prevention and security measures
In connection with a merger, acquisition, reorganization, sale of assets, or bankruptcy proceeding (with notice to users and subject to applicable laws)
With your explicit consent or at your direction, such as when you request us to share information with a third party
In aggregated, anonymized, or de-identified form for research, analytics, or business purposes that do not identify individual users

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your information, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal information, subject to applicable laws and regulations:
items: Right to Access: Access and receive a copy of your personal information that we hold, including details about how we use and share your information
Right to Rectification: Request correction of inaccurate, incomplete, or outdated personal information
Right to Erasure: Request deletion of your personal information when it is no longer necessary for the purposes for which it was collected, subject to legal retention requirements
Right to Object: Object to processing of your personal information for certain purposes, including direct marketing
Right to Restrict Processing: Request restriction of processing your personal information in certain circumstances
Right to Data Portability: Receive your personal data in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format, and transmit it to another controller
Right to Withdraw Consent: Withdraw your consent at any time where we rely on consent as the legal basis for processing
Right to Lodge a Complaint: File a complaint with the relevant data protection authority if you believe your rights have been violated

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: Our website may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience. You can set your browser to refuse cookies, but this may limit some functionality of our website.

thirdPartyLinks.title: Third-Party Links
thirdPartyLinks.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites, including Burooj Air (buroojair.com). We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these external sites. We encourage you to review their privacy policies.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.

changesToPolicy.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changesToPolicy.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us at:

agreementToTerms.title: Agreement to Terms
agreementToTerms.content: By accessing and using this website (burooj.pro), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and conditions set forth in this agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our website. These terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or use our services.

useLicense.title: Use License
useLicense.content: Permission is granted to temporarily access the materials on Burooj's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title. Under this license, you may not, and you agree not to:
items: Modify, adapt, alter, translate, or create derivative works from the materials
Copy, reproduce, duplicate, or redistribute the materials in any form or medium
Use the materials for any commercial purpose, including but not limited to advertising, marketing, or promotional activities
Use the materials for any public display, performance, or distribution without prior written consent
Attempt to reverse engineer, decompile, disassemble, or otherwise attempt to derive the source code of any software contained on the website
Remove, alter, or obscure any copyright, trademark, patent, or other proprietary rights notices from the materials
Transfer, sublicense, lease, lend, rent, or otherwise distribute the materials to another person or entity
'Mirror' or frame the materials on any other server or website without authorization
Use automated systems, bots, scrapers, or similar tools to access, collect, or harvest information from the website
Use the materials in any manner that violates applicable laws, regulations, or these Terms

services.title: Services
services.content: Burooj provides integrated solutions across engineering, construction, property management, and drone-powered cleaning services. All service descriptions, pricing, and availability are subject to change without notice. We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason at any time.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts and Responsibilities
userAccounts.content: If you create an account or submit information through our website, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to:
items: Provide accurate, current, and complete information when creating an account or submitting forms
Maintain and promptly update your information to keep it accurate, current, and complete
Maintain the security and confidentiality of your password, username, and any other identification credentials
Use a strong, unique password and not share your account credentials with any third party
Accept all responsibility for all activities, transactions, and communications that occur under your account, whether authorized or unauthorized
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access, use, or suspected security breach of your account
Log out of your account at the end of each session, especially when using shared or public computers
Not impersonate any person or entity, or falsely state or misrepresent your affiliation with any person or entity
Not use another person's account without their express permission

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on this website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, photographs, illustrations, audio clips, video clips, digital downloads, software, code, designs, layouts, user interfaces, trademarks, service marks, trade names, and any other materials, is the property of Burooj or its content suppliers, licensors, or partners and is protected by Saudi Arabian and international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws. The compilation, arrangement, and presentation of all content on this site is the exclusive property of Burooj. You may not use, reproduce, distribute, modify, create derivative works of, publicly display, publicly perform, republish, download, store, or transmit any of the material on our website without our prior written consent, except as expressly permitted by these Terms.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The materials on Burooj's website are provided on an 'as is' basis. Burooj makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights. Further, Burooj does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials on its website or otherwise relating to such materials or on any sites linked to this site.

limitations.title: Limitations of Liability
limitations.content: To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, in no event shall Burooj, its directors, officers, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, contractors, affiliates, subsidiaries, or licensors be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, punitive, or exemplary damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, revenue, data, use, goodwill, business opportunities, or other intangible losses, whether based on contract, tort (including negligence), strict liability, or otherwise, resulting from:
items: Your use or inability to use the service, website, or any content thereon
Any unauthorized access to or use of our servers, systems, databases, and/or any personal information, financial information, or other data stored therein
Any interruption, suspension, or cessation of transmission to or from our service, including but not limited to network failures, server downtime, or maintenance
Any bugs, viruses, trojan horses, malware, ransomware, or other harmful code that may be transmitted to or through our service or website
Any errors, mistakes, inaccuracies, or omissions in any content, materials, or information provided on the website
Any loss or damage incurred as a result of the use of any content posted, emailed, transmitted, or otherwise made available through the service
Any defamatory, offensive, or illegal conduct of any third party
Any failure to meet any obligation due to causes beyond our reasonable control, including but not limited to acts of God, natural disasters, war, terrorism, labor disputes, or government actions
Any delay or failure in performance resulting from causes beyond our reasonable control

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless Burooj and its licensee and licensors, and their employees, contractors, agents, officers and directors, from and against any and all claims, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs or debt, and expenses (including but not limited to attorney's fees) arising from your use of the website or violation of these Terms.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be interpreted and governed by the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes arising from or relating to these Terms or the use of this website shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

severability.title: Severability
severability.content: If any provision of these Terms is found to be unenforceable or invalid, that provision will be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary so that these Terms will otherwise remain in full force and effect and enforceable.

revisions.title: Revisions and Updates
revisions.content: Burooj may revise these terms of service for its website at any time without notice. By using this website, you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service. We reserve the right to update, change, or replace any part of these Terms by posting updates and changes to our website. It is your responsibility to check this page periodically for changes.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your access immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the website will cease immediately.

contactInformation.title: Contact Information
contactInformation.content: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at:

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with us for consultations, proposals, or any inquiries.
contact.descriptionFull: Reach out for consultations, proposals, or to learn more about our comprehensive solutions across engineering, construction, property management, and drone cleaning.

form.name: Full Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your project or inquiry...
form.fileUploadHint: PDF, DOC, DOCX, JPG, PNG (max 5MB per file)
form.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully.
form.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

errors.name: Please enter your full name.
errors.phone: Use a valid Saudi mobile number.
errors.message: Message should be at least 10 characters.

hero.headline: Integrated Solutions for Smarter, Stronger, and Cleaner Spaces.
hero.subheadline: Burooj unifies engineering, property management, and drone-powered cleaning into one seamless experience—delivering efficiency, precision, and long-lasting value across every project.

about.title: A
about.description:
Burooj delivers integrated solutions across engineering, construction, property management, and drone-powered cleaning. With a focus on quality, speed, and technology-driven efficiency, we support buildings throughout their entire lifecycle—from design and development to daily operations and long-term maintenance.

Our unified approach allows clients to rely on one trusted partner for everything their property needs—architecture, fit-outs, smart systems, asset management, and advanced cleaning solutions.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Engineering, property management, and drone-powered cleaning—designed to support every stage of a building's lifecycle with clarity, precision, and modern efficiency.

construction.title: CONSTRUCTION
construction.description: Architecture, interiors, MEP, and smart systems that keep developments future-ready. Every solution is documented with detailed drawings and 3D visuals for clients and partners.

property.title: PROPERTY
property.description: 360° operations that combine leasing, compliance, finance, and tenant services. We deliver transparent reporting and reliable execution at every stage.

drone.title: DRONE
drone.description: The region's first drone cleaning program, covering facades, solar farms, industrial infrastructure, and other high-access assets with zero scaffolding required.
